articles.description: Thanks to some determined sleuthing, a little luck and even some divine intervention, a long-lost interview with Led Zeppelin has resurfaced in Australia.
articles.content: Australian researchers have unearthed rock n roll gold in the form of a long-lost interview with legendary Led Zeppelin member John Bonham. The 1971 tape of the late drummer who rarely, if ever, spok… [+1866 chars]

articles.author: Marta Jary
articles.title: Bec Judd targeted by trolls after Nadia Bartel scandal - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bec Judd has come under fire from trolls who are targeting her after her friend and fellow WAG Nadia Bartel was embroiled in a viral video scandal.
articles.content:
Bec Judd has come under fire from trolls who are targeting her after her friend and fellow WAG Nadia Bartel was embroiled in a viral video scandal.
